name: Cupcake Deluxe
description:
Cupcakes, yummy! Get TOP cupcake cooking game and have fun.

Become a master chef and start creating, baking and decorating cupcakes of your dreams.

Select your favorite cup, cupcake shape, toppings and decorations. When finished, eat your masterpiece, then start blowing and popping soap bubbles or play slide puzzle mini game.

This cupcake maker is appropriate for everyone who likes cooking, making, serving or just eating cupcakes.

Features:
• beautiful high quality HD graphics
• intuitive, easy to use interface with draggable items for better positioning
• infinite game play with unlimited combinations
• many different types of cups and cakes
• lots of colorful toppings, creams, candies, fruits, waffles, waffle rolls, candy canes, crumbs...
• umbrellas, palms and sound making toys for decoration
• screenshots of cupcake can be saved in your photo gallery
• soap bubbles minigame
• slide puzzle minigame
